review_data.title: Nice !
review_data.content: Nice place to grab a juice or coffee in between meeting or during a stroll in the city ... cool combination with the flower shop ... as everything in Zürich .... not cheap ...

review_data.title: Flower power!
review_data.content: This place is amazing! It is a restaurant inside a flower shop! I have had lunch many times, I have had coffees hundred times, but i never bought any flower (although very nice, they are bloody expensive). Kitchen is run by Hiltl. So there is...More

review_data.title: Le café/fleuriste: lieu agréable et reposant
review_data.content: Le principe est simple, encore fallait-il avoir l'idée: implanter un café dans la boutique du fleuriste ! Cadre superbe et...More

review_data.title: very refreshing in midst flowers and more space than in other Hiltl Rest.
review_data.content: When I am in Zurich I always go there in the morning for coffee and sometimes for an informal lunch with a friend. It is vegetarian from the famous Hiltl buffet style you put your plate on a scale and pay per weight. they also...More
